## Student Portal Login Instructions

1. Go to the student login page
2. Enter your email address
3. Enter the password provided above
4. Click "Login"
5. After logging in, you can view your dashboard with:
   - Profile information
   - Fee details and payment history
   - Attendance records

## Password Reset

If students need to reset their password:
- Contact your administrator/teacher
- They can reset your password from the admin dashboard
